description.value:
Motion characterizes the physical-a boulder falls, creatures move, the world turns. You believe the truest form of mind over matter is therefore to move things as well, wielding telekinesis as an arm that can grasp the furthest and finest of objects.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Kinetic Ram]{Kinetic Ram}
  • 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Maneuver]{Telekinetic Maneuver}
  • 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Levitate]{Levitate}
  • 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fly]{Fly}
  • 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Haul]{Telekinetic Haul}
  • 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Poltergeist's Fury]{Poltergeist's Fury}
  • 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Bombardment]{Telekinetic Bombardment}
  • 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Falling Sky]{Falling Sky}
  • 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Implosion]{Implosion}

Standard Psi Cantrips

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mage Hand]{Mage Hand}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Projectile]{Telekinetic Projectile}

Unique Psi Cantrips

  • surface: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Rend]{Telekinetic Rend}
  • deeper: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Vector Screen]{Vector Screen}
  • deepest: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dancing Blade]{Dancing Blade}
